item.title: （QRSS）（FSK-CW）2200m波长的100W发射放大器100W Transmitter Amplifier for 2200m
item.dc:creator: @azide azide
item.description:
100W Transmitter Amplifier for 2200m

This particular transmitter was later shipped up to VY1JA in the Yukon where, thanks to Jay’s excellent antenna system, it was heard in Europe as well as in New Zealand during one of the Trans-Pacific Tests! Running 24 volts on the final will produce 100 watts into a 50 ohm load. The transmitter utilizes a 4060 binary counter IC chip as both the crystal oscillator and frequency divider. I used a 2200 kHz crystal along with the ‘divide-by’ sixteen output to produce a signal at 137.5 kHz. Other combinations of crystal frequencies and ‘divide-by’ combinations may also be used since the 4060 features divided outputs for f/32 (pin 5) and f/64 (pin 4), among others. You may have a 4MHz crystal or an 8MHz crystal in your junk box that will put you in the band using these output pins.

I used a crystal oven from a very old taxi cab fm radio to mount the crystal but do not use the ‘oven’ feature. I discovered that the thermostat-controlled heating / cooling cycle produced more drift than simply leaving the oven off. I have however, lined both the inside and the outside of the oven with styrofoam in hopes of keeping the crystal’s temperature change to a minimum. Initial tests indicate that it is entirely adequate for QRSS30 speeds. I have not yet tested it at QRSS60, where even the slightest drift shows up very quickly.

The transmitter is simple and inexpensive to construct. The IRF540 FET final runs very cool, although it should probably be heat sinked. I have also used IRF640s with little or no change noted. All coils and transformers are wound on ABS or PVC tubing.

TRANSMITTER SCHEMATIC

I used the “Manhattan Style” of construction on pc board.

TRANSMITTER PCB

Output Transformer (T1) - wound on 1.5" tubing ~ 5 inches in length. Wind the secondary first which consists of 80 turns of ~ #20 enamel wire. Wind the primary centered on top of the secondary with 15 turns of ~ #16 enamel, close spaced. Before winding the primary, wrap the center part of the secondary with PVC electrical tape or heavy plumber’s teflon tape.

Output Filter (L1) - wound on 2" tubing ~ 5 inches in length. Wrap 80 turns of #20, close spaced with taps at 40 turns and every 5 turns until the end.

The capacitor used at the drain of the FET should be of high quality such as polycarbonate or mica. Although the original design indicated a 1 uF capacitor at the top end of T1’s primary, I found that the 2.2uf gave a better waveform across the FET’s drain. Look for the typical class-e type waveform at the drain.

CLASS-E WAVEFORM

Operation - Mitch’s version of this amp appears to be operating at greater efficiency than the one I built. Running the final at 24VDC, the FET draws around 6.5-7 amps for an input of approximately 160W. With a measured output of 95W, the efficiency is around 60%. A properly designed class-e amplifier should realize much higher efficiencies so there is still plenty of room for improvement on this design. One of the things I would like to do is experiment with the output transformer in order to optimize its performance. Perhaps rewinding it on a ferrite core would help. The output transformer develops a lot of heat, indicating a substantial power waste. Perhaps that is where the missing 30% efficiency can be reclaimed.

Operate the transmitter into a 50 ohm dummy load or your resonant (50 ohm) antenna system. You might want to ‘tune-up’ at a lower voltage and then increase the drain voltage when adjustments are completed. Start with the antenna tapped at the coaxial end of the filter coil. As you tap closer to the center, power output will increase, as will final amplifier drain current. You will reach a point where the output does not increase any further, even though drain current has increased. Tap at the point of best efficiency. The output waveform should be a clean sine-wave.

OUTPUT WAVEFORM

I have run this transmitter all night long on several occasions, at QRSS30, and it has performed very well for such an easy design. I use a K1EL QRSS keyer chip to generate the QRSS beacon keying or the ‘QRSS’ freeware by ON7YD (available on his website).

item.title: 论坛资料的索引，整理，编纂的计划。通信，生产，安全技术通俗化的计划。
item.dc:creator: @adt adt
item.description:
这仅仅是一个提纲，想到哪里写道哪里，其顺序并非按重要性列出，欢迎同志们补充。

第一部分

电子、计算机、计算机网络、无线电、电子对抗、密码学

第二部分

机械、冶金技术、成型技术

第三部分

化工技术

第四部分

军事：弹药学、弹道学、雷达

第五部分

经济与统计和交通、农业、采矿业

item.title: 论坛资料的索引，整理，编纂的计划。通信，生产，安全技术通俗化的计划。
item.dc:creator: @adt adt
item.description:
方针2：尽量多给出关键词方便检索，对于重点的关键词才展开论述。

文字中要有适当的图标。

关键词要有ISBN或者DOI。

请参考目录学或者知识论。

item.title: 国际新闻简报
item.dc:creator: @mlmrg 马列毛主义，主要是毛主义万岁!
item.description:
9月15日
【乌克兰民族解放战争进展】
乌总参谋部称消灭俄帝侵略军约200名士兵、13辆坦克、17辆装甲车、21辆军车/油罐车、5套火炮系统、4架飞机(三架Su-25和一架Su-24M)。
俄帝国防部称消灭乌军13辆坦克和装甲车、50辆军车、1门野战炮和迫击炮、12架无人机。
欧盟帝国主义集团委员会主席访问基辅。
欧盟帝国主义集团议会批准对乌克兰的50亿欧元“援助”计划。
欧洲投资银行向乌克兰提供用于修复基建的5亿欧元“援助”。
西班牙帝国主义国防大臣称将在本国训练乌克兰军队。
【战场外的帝国主义博弈】
俄帝头子普京在乌兹别克斯坦会见中修头子习近平。
[美国明尼苏达护士罢工]
[美帝参议院外务委员会通过《2022年台湾政策法》]
[瑞典帝国主义头子辞职]
[瑞典8月通货膨胀率升至9%]
[日帝“防卫”省称1中修海军测量船进入日帝鹿儿岛县附近领海]
[立陶宛8月通货膨胀率达22.4%]
[肯尼亚反动政府削减燃料补贴]
[缅甸曼德勒发生交通事故，13死23伤]
[尼加拉瓜发生里氏5.7级地震]

item.title: 華修刊物《燼·火》、《新紅旗》（Mac OS法西斯主義）
item.dc:creator: @Xuan_JunHe Xuan_JunHe
item.description:
《烬·火》第0刊.pdf (7.0 MB)

item.title: 国际新闻简报
item.dc:creator: @mlmrg 马列毛主义，主要是毛主义万岁!
item.description:
9月13日
【乌克兰民族解放战争进展】
乌总参谋部称消灭俄帝侵略军约350名士兵、7辆坦克、22辆装甲车、6辆军车/油罐车、10套火炮系统、3套防空系统、1架无人机(伊朗制造)、17枚巡航导弹。
俄帝国防部称消灭乌军9辆坦克和装甲车、7辆军车、6门野战炮和迫击炮、3门多管火箭炮、1架直升机、6架无人机。
乌总统称收复6000余平方公里领土。
【阿塞拜疆和亚美尼亚发生武装冲突】
亚美尼亚与阿塞拜疆发生武装冲突，亚美尼亚方面称49名亚美尼亚士兵阵亡。
阿塞拜疆媒体称双方达成停火协定。
[英帝国家统计局称失业率下降至3.6%，实质薪资同比去年减缩2.8%]
[加帝多伦多发生枪击，2死多伤]
[缅甸木姐发生枪击，3死]
[叙利亚发生霍乱，8例死亡]
[伊朗南呼罗珊发生5.1级地震]
[印度塞康德拉巴德发生火灾，8死11伤]
[马达加斯加2船碰撞，9死]
